Package ohos.agp.components.element

Class ShapeElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.element.Element
      • ohos.agp.components.element.ShapeElement

  • public class ShapeElement
extends Element
    Provides an Element instance with a color gradient, which is usually used for component backgrounds.
    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ShapeElement.Orientation
      Indicates the direction of the gradient effect relative to the element object's bounds.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class ohos.agp.components.element.Element

        Element.ConstantState, Element.OnChangeListener

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int ARC
      Indicates that the ShapeElement object is in the shape of arc.
      static int LINE
      Indicates a line.
      static int LINEAR_GRADIENT_SHADER_TYPE
      Indicates that the shader is of the linear type.
      Path mPath
      Indicates a path, for a ShapeElement shape PATH.
      static int OVAL
      Indicates an oval, which can be displayed as an oval or a circle according to the width and height of the component.
      static int PATH
      Indicates that the ShapeElement object is in a shape drawn along a particular path.
      static int RADIAL_GRADIENT_SHADER_TYPE
      Indicates that the shader is of the radial type.
      static int RECTANGLE
      Indicates a rectangle, for which the corner radius can be set.
      static int SWEEP_GRADIENT_SHADER_TYPE
      Indicates that the shader is of the sweep type.

    • Method Detail

      • setShape

        public void setShape​(int shape)
        Sets the shape.
        Parameters:
        shape - Indicates the shape, which can be RECTANGLE, OVAL, LINE, ARC, or PATH.

      • getShape

        public int getShape​()
        Obtains the shape of this ShapeElement object.
        Returns:
        Returns the integer that represents the shape.

      • setRgbColor

        public void setRgbColor​(RgbColor color)
        Sets the color for filling a ShapeElement object.

        This method does not take effect if the shape of the ShapeElement instance is LINE. Use the setRgbColors(ohos.agp.colors.RgbColor[]) method to achieve gradient effect.

        Parameters:
        color - Indicates the color value.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        setRgbColors(RgbColor[]), RgbPalette

      • setRgbColors

        public void setRgbColors​(RgbColor[] colors)
        Sets the colors for filling a ShapeElement object with gradient effect.

        This method does not take effect if the shape of the ShapeElement object is LINE. You can call setRgbColor(ohos.agp.colors.RgbColor) to apply a single color to a ShapeElement object.

        Parameters:
        colors - Indicates the colors for filling the shape element object.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        setRgbColor(RgbColor), getRgbColors()

      • getRgbColors

        public RgbColor[] getRgbColors​()
        Obtains the color filled in this ShapeElement object.
        Returns:
        Returns the array of color gradients; returns an element if a pure color is set.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        setRgbColors(RgbColor[]), setRgbColor(RgbColor)

        public void setStroke​(int width,

        Parameters:

        color - Indicates the border color.
        Since:

      • setCornerRadius

        public void setCornerRadius​(float radius)
        Sets the corner radius. This parameter is valid only when the shape is RECTANGLE.
        Parameters:
        radius - Indicates the radius. If this parameter is set to a value greater than 0, the rectangle is a rounded rectangle. If the value is less than 0, the setting is invalid.

      • getCornerRadius

        public float getCornerRadius​()
        Obtains the corner radius.
        Returns:
        Returns the radius, in floating number.

      • setCornerRadiiArray

        public void setCornerRadiiArray​(float[] radii)
        Sets the each corner's radius. This parameter is valid only when the shape is RECTANGLE.
        Parameters:
        radii - Indicates the radius array of four corners. If the array's length is not equal to 8, the setting is invalid. Each pair of radius means one corner's x-axis radius and y-axis radius.
        Since:
        4

      • getCornerRadii

        public float[] getCornerRadii​()
        Obtains the four corner's radius.
        Returns:
        Returns the radii, in floating array numbers.
        Since:
        3

      • setShaderType

        public void setShaderType​(int type)
        Sets the shader type.
        Parameters:
        type - Indicates the shader type, which can be LINEAR_GRADIENT_SHADER_TYPE, RADIAL_GRADIENT_SHADER_TYPE, or SWEEP_GRADIENT_SHADER_TYPE.
        Since:
        3

      • getShaderType

        public int getShaderType​()
        Obtains the shader type.
        Returns:
        Returns the shader type.
        Since:
        3

      • setDashPathEffectValues

        public void setDashPathEffectValues​(float[] intervals,
                                    float phase)
        Adds dash path effect intervals and phase for this element.
        Parameters:
        intervals - Indicates the dash path effect value array to set. The array items are in pairs: The even and odd indices of these values specify the number of pixels to draw and the number of blank pixels, respectively.
        phase - Indicates the dash path effect phase.
        Since:
        3
